TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
ANSWER_1: The system is an online appointment platform.
ANSWER_2: You register and can start appointment your services online.
QUESTION_3: What types of services can I book?
ANSWER_3: You can book a variety of services such as medical appointments, beauty services, home maintenance, among others.
ANSWER_4: Yes, the appointment is confirmed immediately after the reservation process is completed.
QUESTION_5: How can I cancel a appointment?
ANSWER_5: You can cancel your appointment through the 'My Appointments' section in your profile by following the cancellation instructions.
ANSWER_6: Cancellation fees depend on the type of service and the time remaining until the appointment. Please check the cancellation policy for details.
ANSWER_7: You can contact support via our online chat or by sending an email to support@example.com.
ANSWER_8: Yes, you can reschedule your appointment in the 'My Appointments' section by following the rescheduling instructions.
ANSWER_9: To register, click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner and fill out the form with your personal information.
ANSWER_10: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and online payments such as PayPal.
QUESTION_11: Can I book services for other people?
ANSWER_11: Yes, you can book services on behalf of others by entering the recipient's information during the appointment process.
ANSWER_12: Yes, we use advanced security measures to ensure your personal data is protected.
